trans-unit.source: Provides navigation and a user interface (UI) to collect related data across multiple steps.
trans-unit.target: 提供巡覽和使用者介面 (UI) 來收集多個步驟的相關的資料。

trans-unit.source: In this topic: - [Introduction](#introduction) - [Wizard Components](#components) - [Wizard Steps](#wizard_steps) - [Collecting Wizard Data](#collecting_wizard_data) - [Wizard Command Names](#wizard_command_names) - [Dynamically Changing Steps](#dynamically_changing_steps) - [Wizard Appearance](#wizard_appearance) - [Formatting Using Layout Templates](#formatting_using_layout_templates) - [Accessibility](#accessibility) - [Declarative Syntax](#declarative_syntax) ## Introduction You can use the Wizard control to: - Collect related data across multiple steps.
trans-unit.target: 本主題內容:-[簡介](#introduction) - [精靈元件](#components) - [精靈步驟](#wizard_steps) - [收集精靈資料](#collecting_wizard_data) - [精靈 」 的命令名稱](#wizard_command_names) - [動態步驟](#dynamically_changing_steps) - [精靈外觀](#wizard_appearance) - [格式化使用的版面配置範本](#formatting_using_layout_templates) - [協助工具](#accessibility) - [宣告式語法](#declarative_syntax) # # 介紹您可以使用精靈控制項:-收集多個步驟的相關的資料。

trans-unit.source: - Break up a larger Web page used to collect user input into smaller logical steps.
trans-unit.target: -分解成較小的邏輯步驟收集使用者輸入所使用的較大 Web 頁面。

trans-unit.source: - Allow for either linear or nonlinear navigation through the steps.
trans-unit.target: -允許逐步線性或非線性導覽。

trans-unit.source: ## Wizard Components The Wizard control is made up of the following components: - A collection of steps that contain the user interface for each step, as defined by the page developer.
trans-unit.target: # # 精靈元件精靈控制項所組成的下列元件:-集合包含每個步驟的使用者介面所定義的網頁開發人員的步驟。

trans-unit.source: - Built-in navigation capabilities that determine the appropriate buttons to display based on the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase.StepType%2A> value.
trans-unit.target: -內建瀏覽功能，以決定適當的按鈕以顯示根據<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase.StepType%2A>值。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase.StepType%2A>

trans-unit.source: - A header area that can be customized to display information specific to the step that the user is currently on.
trans-unit.target: -您可以自訂以步驟的使用者是目前在顯示的特定資訊頁首區域。

trans-unit.source: - A sidebar area that can be used to quickly navigate to steps in the control.
trans-unit.target: -控制項中的步驟可用來快速瀏覽至 a [資訊看板] 區域。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > If you are using Microsoft Visual Studio 2005, note that the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.ActiveStepIndex%2A> is persisted in Source view.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 如果您使用 Microsoft Visual Studio 2005，請注意，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.ActiveStepIndex%2A>保存在原始碼檢視。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.ActiveStepIndex%2A>

trans-unit.source: If you change the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.WizardSteps%2A> property in Design view by clicking the sidebar buttons, and you then run the page, the first step of the `Wizard` control might not be shown because the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.ActiveStepIndex%2A> might be pointing to a different step.
trans-unit.target: 如果您變更<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.WizardSteps%2A>屬性在設計檢視中按一下 [資訊看板] 按鈕時，您接著執行網頁的第一個步驟`Wizard`控制項可能不會顯示，因為<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.ActiveStepIndex%2A>可能指向不同的步驟。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.ActiveStepIndex%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.WizardSteps%2A>

trans-unit.source: ## Wizard Steps Each of the steps in the Wizard control has a property that determines the kind of navigation functionality that the step has.
trans-unit.target: # # 每個精靈控制項中的步驟都有精靈步驟屬性，可決定此步驟中有的瀏覽功能種類。

trans-unit.source: If you do not specify a value for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase.StepType%2A> property, the default value is <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepType>.
trans-unit.target: 如果您未指定值的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase.StepType%2A>屬性，則預設值為<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepType>。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepType> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase.StepType%2A>

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the available settings for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase.StepType%2A> property and the resulting behavior of the step.
trans-unit.target: 下表列出可用的設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase.StepType%2A>屬性及步驟的產生的行為。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase.StepType%2A>

trans-unit.source: `WizardStepType.Auto` The navigation UI that is rendered for the step is determined by the order in which the step is declared.
trans-unit.target: `WizardStepType.Auto`瀏覽步驟呈現 UI 取決於宣告該步驟的順序。

trans-unit.source: `WizardStepType.Complete` The step is the last one to appear.
trans-unit.target: `WizardStepType.Complete`步驟是要顯示的最後一個。

trans-unit.source: No navigation buttons are rendered.
trans-unit.target: 沒有瀏覽按鈕會呈現。

trans-unit.source: `WizardStepType.Finish` The step is the last one that collects user data.
trans-unit.target: `WizardStepType.Finish`步驟是收集使用者資料的最後一個。

trans-unit.source: The **Finish** button is rendered for navigation.
trans-unit.target: **完成**呈現巡覽按鈕。

trans-unit.source: `WizardStepType.Start` The step is the first one to appear.
trans-unit.target: `WizardStepType.Start`步驟是要顯示的第一個。

trans-unit.source: A **Previous** button is not rendered.
trans-unit.target: A**上一步**不呈現 按鈕。

trans-unit.source: `WizardStepType.Step` The step is any step between the first and last.
trans-unit.target: `WizardStepType.Step`在步驟之間的任一步驟第一個和最後一個。

trans-unit.source: **Previous** and **Next** buttons are rendered for navigation.
trans-unit.target: **前一個**和**下一個**呈現巡覽按鈕。

trans-unit.source: ## Collecting Wizard Data Using the Wizard control, data can be collected through linear or nonlinear navigation.
trans-unit.target: # # 使用精靈控制項收集的精靈資料，您可以透過線性或非線性導覽收集資料。

trans-unit.source: Some examples of nonlinear navigation are skipping unnecessary steps or returning to a previously completed step to change some value.
trans-unit.target: 非線性導覽的一些範例會略過不必要的步驟，或返回先前完成的步驟來變更某個值。

trans-unit.source: The Wizard control maintains its state between steps, so the data entered on a step does not need to be persisted to a data store until all the steps of the Wizard control have been completed.
trans-unit.target: 精靈控制項會維護兩個步驟，因此不需要保存到資料存放區，直到精靈控制項的所有步驟都已都完成上一個步驟輸入的資料及其狀態。

trans-unit.source: Alternatively, if you want to persist the collected data to a data store as each step is completed, such as when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.NextButtonClick> event is raised, you should set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase.AllowReturn%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase> object to `false` so that the user cannot return to a previously completed step and change the data once it has been submitted.
trans-unit.target: 或者，如果您想要收集的資料保存到資料存放區為每個步驟完成，例如當<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.NextButtonClick>就會引發事件，應將<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase.AllowReturn%2A>屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase>物件`false`使使用者無法返回先前完成的步驟，而一旦已提交變更的資料。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase.AllowReturn%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.NextButtonClick>

trans-unit.source: ## Wizard Command Names The Wizard control inherits the following command names from the class and class: , , , and .
trans-unit.target: # # 精靈控制項繼承下列的命令名稱，從精靈命令名稱類別和類別︰ ， ， ，和。

trans-unit.source: The Wizard control ignores these command names and does not include any special logic to enable these commands to automatically work for navigation.
trans-unit.target: 精靈控制項忽略這些命令名稱，而且不包含任何特殊的邏輯，可啟用瀏覽自動執行這些命令。

trans-unit.source: If a command name is removed or is missing from a button in the Wizard control, no exception is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 如果命令名稱遭到移除，或遺漏精靈控制項中的按鈕，則會擲不回任何例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: For example, if the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.StartNavigationTemplate%2A> button is missing a value for <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button.CommandName%2A>, no exception is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.StartNavigationTemplate%2A>按鈕遺漏的值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button.CommandName%2A>，擲回任何例外狀況。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button.CommandName%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.StartNavigationTemplate%2A>

trans-unit.source: ## Dynamically Changing Steps You can use the method or the property to dynamically change the step that is currently displayed in the Wizard control.
trans-unit.target: # # 動態變更步驟您可以使用方法或屬性動態變更目前顯示在精靈控制項中的步驟。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > If you programmatically add a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStep> in the `Page_Load` event handler, you must add the navigation to that step prior to the page loading.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 如果您以程式設計方式加入<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStep>中`Page_Load`事件處理常式，您必須新增瀏覽到該頁面載入之前的步驟。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStep>

trans-unit.source: ## Wizard Appearance The appearance of the Wizard control is fully customizable through templates, skins, and style settings.
trans-unit.target: # # 精靈外觀精靈控制項的外觀是可以完全自訂，透過範本、 面板和樣式設定。

trans-unit.source: For example, you can use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.HeaderTemplate%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.SideBarTemplate%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.StartNavigationTemplate%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.FinishNavigationTemplate%2A>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.StepNavigationTemplate%2A> properties to customize the interface of the Wizard control.
trans-unit.target: 例如，您可以使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.HeaderTemplate%2A>， <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.SideBarTemplate%2A>， <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.StartNavigationTemplate%2A>， <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.FinishNavigationTemplate%2A>，和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.StepNavigationTemplate%2A>屬性，以自訂精靈控制項的介面。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.StepNavigationTemplate%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.FinishNavigationTemplate%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.StartNavigationTemplate%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.SideBarTemplate%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.HeaderTemplate%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.FinishNavigationTemplate%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.DisplaySideBar%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.HeaderTemplate%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.SideBarTemplate%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.StartNavigationTemplate%2A>, or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.StepNavigationTemplate%2A> property recreates the child controls of the Wizard control.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.FinishNavigationTemplate%2A>， <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.DisplaySideBar%2A>， <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.HeaderTemplate%2A>， <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.SideBarTemplate%2A>， <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.StartNavigationTemplate%2A>，或<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.StepNavigationTemplate%2A>屬性重新建立精靈控制項的子控制項。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.StepNavigationTemplate%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.StartNavigationTemplate%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.SideBarTemplate%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.HeaderTemplate%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.DisplaySideBar%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.FinishNavigationTemplate%2A>

trans-unit.source: As a result, the view state for the child controls is lost in the process.
trans-unit.target: 如此一來，子控制項的檢視狀態中的程序會遺失。

trans-unit.source: To avoid this situation, explicitly maintain the control state of the Wizard control's child controls explicitly, or avoid putting controls inside of templates.
trans-unit.target: 若要避免這種情況下，明確地明確地維護精靈控制項的子控制項的控制項狀態，或避免讓範本內部的控制項。

trans-unit.source: Note that the Wizard control does not support special Microsoft Internet Explorer rendering for non-standard or quirks mode.
trans-unit.target: 請注意精靈控制項不支援特殊的 Microsoft Internet Explorer 呈現的非標準或 quirks 模式。

trans-unit.source: To get the best Internet Explorer rendering using the Wizard control, use the XHTML doc type, which is added by default in Visual Web Developer and Visual Studio.
trans-unit.target: 若要取得最佳的 Internet Explorer 轉譯使用精靈的控制項，請使用 XHTML 文件類型，它會根據預設，Visual Web Developer 和 Visual Studio 中加入。

trans-unit.source: ## Formatting Using Layout Templates The Wizard control lets you specify the layout of the control without requiring you to use an HTML `table` element.
trans-unit.target: # # 格式使用版面配置範本精靈控制項可讓您指定控制項的配置，而不需要您使用 HTML`table`項目。

trans-unit.source: Instead, you can use a `LayoutTemplate` element to specify the layout.
trans-unit.target: 相反地，您可以使用`LayoutTemplate`項目來指定版面配置。

trans-unit.source: In the template, you create placeholder controls to indicate where items should be dynamically inserted into the control.
trans-unit.target: 在範本中，您建立預留位置，表示其中的項目應該以動態方式插入控制項的控制項。

trans-unit.source: (This is similar to how the template model for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView> control works.) For more information, see the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.LayoutTemplate%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: (這是類似於如何範本模型<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView>控制運作。)</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView>如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.LayoutTemplate%2A?displayProperty=fullName>屬性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.LayoutTemplate%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: ## Accessibility For information about how to configure this control so that it generates markup that conforms to accessibility standards, see [Accessibility in Visual Studio and ASP.NET](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) and [ASP.NET Controls and Accessibility](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: # # 有關如何設定這個控制項，使其產生標記，並符合協助工具標準，協助工具的資訊，請參閱[Visual Studio 和 ASP.NET 中的協助工具](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)和[ASP.NET 控制項和協助工具](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: ## Declarative Syntax ```                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                ```
trans-unit.target: # # 宣告式語法```                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                ```

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: Use the Wizard constructor to create and initialize a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard> class.
trans-unit.target: 建立和初始化<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard>類別</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard>的新執行個體使用的精靈建構函式

trans-unit.source: Gets the step in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.WizardSteps*> collection that is currently displayed to the user.
trans-unit.target: 取得中的步驟<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.WizardSteps*>目前顯示給使用者的集合。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.WizardSteps*>

trans-unit.source: The ActiveStep property returns the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase> object that is currently displayed in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard> control.
trans-unit.target: ActiveStep 屬性會傳回<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase>目前顯示在物件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard>控制項。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase>

trans-unit.source: The ActiveStep property is read-only; however, you can use the ActiveStep property to access the properties of the current <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase> object.
trans-unit.target: ActiveStep 屬性是唯讀的。不過，您可以使用 ActiveStep 屬性來存取目前的屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase>物件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase>

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.ActiveStepIndex%2A> property to dynamically change the ActiveStep to a different <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase> object.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.ActiveStepIndex%2A>屬性動態變更至不同的 ActiveStep<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase>物件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.ActiveStepIndex%2A>

trans-unit.source: Alternatively, you can use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.MoveTo%2A> method to dynamically set the ActiveStep property.
trans-unit.target: 或者，您可以使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.MoveTo%2A>方法屬性設為動態 ActiveStep。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.MoveTo%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase"></xref> that is currently displayed to the user.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase"> </xref>目前顯示給使用者。

trans-unit.source: The corresponding <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.ActiveStepIndex*> is less than -1 or greater than the number of <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase"></xref> objects in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 對應<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.ActiveStepIndex*>小於-1 或大於的<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase"></xref>中的物件<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard"> </xref>。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.ActiveStepIndex*>

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the user switches to a new step in the control.
trans-unit.target: 發生於使用者切換至新控制項中的步驟。

trans-unit.source: The ActiveStepChanged event is raised when the current step that is displayed in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard> control changes.
trans-unit.target: ActiveStepChanged 事件時引發目前的步驟，顯示在<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard>控制的變更。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard>

trans-unit.source: Use the ActiveStepChanged event to provide additional processing when the current step of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard> control changes.
trans-unit.target: 使用 ActiveStepChanged 事件提供額外的處理時的目前步驟<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard>控制的變更。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB︰ 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the index of the current <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定目前的索引<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: The ActiveStepIndex property provides the zero-based index of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase> object that is currently displayed in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard> control.
trans-unit.target: ActiveStepIndex 屬性提供的以零為起始的索引<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase>目前顯示在物件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard>控制項。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase>

trans-unit.source: You can programmatically set the ActiveStepIndex property to control which step is displayed to the user at run time.
trans-unit.target: 您可以透過程式設計方式設定 ActiveStepIndex 屬性來控制哪些步驟，會在執行階段顯示給使用者。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > If you are using Microsoft Visual Studio 2005, note that the ActiveStepIndex is persisted in Source view.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 如果您使用 Microsoft Visual Studio 2005，請注意 ActiveStepIndex 會保存在原始碼檢視。

trans-unit.source: If you change the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.WizardSteps%2A> property in Design view by clicking the sidebar buttons, and you then run the page, the first step of the `Wizard` control might not be shown because the ActiveStepIndex might be pointing to a different step.
trans-unit.target: 如果您變更<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.WizardSteps%2A>屬性在設計檢視中按一下 [資訊看板] 按鈕時，您接著執行網頁的第一個步驟`Wizard`控制項可能不會顯示，因為 ActiveStepIndex 可能指向不同的步驟。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.WizardSteps%2A>

trans-unit.source: If you set the value of ActiveStepIndex to -1 to support a wizard with no steps by default, the following behavior occurs: - If you declaratively set ActiveStepIndex to -1 or set it to -1 as a default value, the control will always try to render the first step in the wizard.
trans-unit.target: 如果您設定 ActiveStepIndex 的值為-1 可支援具有預設的任何步驟的精靈時，就會發生下列行為:-如果您以宣告方式將 ActiveStepIndex 設定為-1 或其設為-1 做為預設值，控制項將永遠嘗試轉譯精靈的第一個步驟的設定。

trans-unit.source: - If you programmatically set ActiveStepIndex to -1, the control will not render.
trans-unit.target: -如果您以程式設計方式設定 ActiveStepIndex 為-1，將不會呈現控制項。

trans-unit.source: This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes.
trans-unit.target: 無法設定這個屬性的主題或樣式表主題。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute> and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute>和[ASP.NET 佈景主題和面板](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。</xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute>

trans-unit.source: The index of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase"></xref> that is currently displayed in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 索引<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase"></xref>目前顯示於<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard"></xref>控制項。

trans-unit.source: The selected value is higher than the number of wizard steps defined in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.WizardSteps*> collection.
trans-unit.target: 選取的值高於精靈步驟中所定義的數目<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.WizardSteps*>集合。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.WizardSteps*>

trans-unit.source: Uses a Boolean value to determine whether the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.ActiveStep*> property can be set to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase"></xref> object that corresponds to the index that is passed in.
trans-unit.target: 使用布林值，以判斷是否<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.ActiveStep*>屬性可以設定為<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase"></xref>物件對應於為傳入的索引，</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.ActiveStep*>

trans-unit.source: The AllowNavigationToStep method can be accessed from a derived class only because of its `protected` modifier.
trans-unit.target: AllowNavigationToStep 方法可以存取的衍生類別只因為從其`protected`修飾詞。

trans-unit.source: In a derived class, you can use the AllowNavigationToStep method to determine whether the index that is passed in can be used to set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.ActiveStepIndex%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 在衍生類別中，您可以使用 AllowNavigationToStep 方法來判斷是否會在傳遞的索引可以用來設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.ActiveStepIndex%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.ActiveStepIndex%2A>

trans-unit.source: The AllowNavigationToStep method will return `false` if the index that is passed in refers to a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase> object that has already been accessed and has its <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase.AllowReturn%2A> property set to `false`; otherwise, it will return `true`.
trans-unit.target: AllowNavigationToStep 方法會傳回`false`如果傳入的索引是指<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase>物件已被存取，且具有其<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase.AllowReturn%2A>屬性設定為`false`; 否則它會傳回`true`。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase.AllowReturn%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase>

trans-unit.source: The index of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase"></xref> object being checked.
trans-unit.target: 索引<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase"></xref>所檢查的物件。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> if the index passed in refers to a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase"></xref> that has already been accessed and its <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase.AllowReturn*> property is set to <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>如果傳入的索引是指<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase"> </xref> ，已被存取並將其<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase.AllowReturn*>屬性設定為<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>，否則<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase.AllowReturn*>

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the **Cancel** button is clicked.
trans-unit.target: 發生時**取消**按鈕。

trans-unit.source: The CancelButtonClick event is raised when the **Cancel** button on the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard> control is clicked.
trans-unit.target: CancelButtonClick 引發時**取消**按鈕<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard>按一下控制項時。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard>

trans-unit.source: Use the CancelButtonClick event to provide additional processing when the **Cancel** button is clicked.
trans-unit.target: 提供額外的處理時使用 CancelButtonClick 事件**取消**按鈕。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB︰ 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Specifies the identifier for the **Cancel** button.
trans-unit.target: 指定的識別項**取消** 按鈕。

trans-unit.source: This field is static and read-only.
trans-unit.target: 此欄位為靜態，且為唯讀。

trans-unit.source: The CancelButtonID field is used primarily by control developers.
trans-unit.target: CancelButtonID 欄位主要由控制項開發人員使用。

trans-unit.source: The value for the CancelButtonID is `"CancelButton"`.
trans-unit.target: 值為 CancelButtonID `"CancelButton"`。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the URL of the image displayed for the **Cancel** button.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定顯示之影像的 URL**取消** 按鈕。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.CancelButtonType%2A> property is set to <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonType>, use the CancelButtonImageUrl property to specify the image to display for the **Cancel** button.
trans-unit.target: 當<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.CancelButtonType%2A>屬性設定為<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonType>，使用 CancelButtonImageUrl 屬性來指定要顯示之影像**取消** 按鈕。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonType> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.CancelButtonType%2A>

trans-unit.source: The URL of the image displayed for the **Cancel** button on the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 顯示影像的 URL**取消**按鈕<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard"></xref>控制項。

trans-unit.source: The default value is an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: 預設值為空字串 ("")。

trans-unit.source: Gets a reference to a collection of style properties that define the appearance of the **Cancel** button.
trans-unit.target: 取得集合所定義的外觀樣式屬性參考**取消** 按鈕。

trans-unit.source: The CancelButtonStyle property defines the appearance for the **Cancel** button on the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard> control.
trans-unit.target: CancelButtonStyle 屬性定義的外觀**取消**按鈕<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard>控制項。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard>

trans-unit.source: The CancelButtonStyle property is read-only; however, you can set the properties of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style> object that it returns.
trans-unit.target: CancelButtonStyle 屬性是唯讀的。不過，您可以設定的屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style>它所傳回的物件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style>

trans-unit.source: You can set these properties declaratively in the form `Property-Subproperty`, where `Subproperty` represents a property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style> class (for example, `CancelButtonStyle-ForeColor`).
trans-unit.target: 您可以在表單中，以宣告方式設定這些屬性`Property-Subproperty`，其中`Subproperty`代表的屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style>類別 (例如， `CancelButtonStyle-ForeColor`)。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style>

trans-unit.source: You can set a property programmatically in the form `Property.Subproperty` (for example, `CancelButtonStyle.ForeColor`).
trans-unit.target: 您可以在表單中，以程式設計方式設定屬性`Property.Subproperty`(例如， `CancelButtonStyle.ForeColor`)。

trans-unit.source: Common settings include custom background color, text color, and font properties.
trans-unit.target: 一般設定包括自訂背景色彩、 文字色彩和字型屬性。

trans-unit.source: The style settings for the CancelButtonStyle property are merged with the style settings for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.NavigationButtonStyle%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: CancelButtonStyle 屬性的樣式設定會與樣式設定合併<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.NavigationButtonStyle%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.NavigationButtonStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: Any setting that is applied in the CancelButtonStyle property overrides the corresponding setting in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.NavigationButtonStyle%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 套用 CancelButtonStyle 屬性中的設定會覆寫中的對應設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.NavigationButtonStyle%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.NavigationButtonStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: A reference to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style"></xref> that defines the style settings for **Cancel** on the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 若要參考<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style"></xref>所定義的樣式設定**取消**上<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the text caption that is displayed for the **Cancel** button.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定所顯示的文字標題**取消** 按鈕。

trans-unit.source: The CancelButtonText property contains the text that is displayed for the **Cancel** button on the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard> control.
trans-unit.target: CancelButtonText 屬性包含文字的顯示**取消**按鈕<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard>控制項。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard>

trans-unit.source: Depending on the value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.CancelButtonType%2A> property, the CancelButtonText property can appear as text on a button, as text displayed as an alternative to an image, or as the text of a link.
trans-unit.target: 值而定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.CancelButtonType%2A>屬性，CancelButtonText 屬性可以顯示為文字的按鈕，以文字顯示為影像的替代方案或連結的文字。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.CancelButtonType%2A>

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.CancelButtonType%2A> values and their respective effects on the **Cancel** button text.
trans-unit.target: 下表列出<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.CancelButtonType%2A>值以及對其各自的影響**取消**按鈕文字。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.CancelButtonType%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonType> Text appears on the button.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonType>文字會出現在按鈕上。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonType>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonType> Text appears as alternative text for the image.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonType>文字會顯示為影像的替代文字。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonType>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonType> Text appears as a link.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonType>文字會顯示為連結。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonType>

trans-unit.source: The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性的值設定時，可以自動儲存到資源檔使用設計工具。

trans-unit.source: The default is `"Cancel"`.

trans-unit.source: The default text for the control is localized based on the current locale for the server.

trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonType"> </xref>。

trans-unit.target: 擷取的命令名稱**取消** 按鈕。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the URL that the user is directed to when they click the **Cancel** button.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定當使用者按一下引導使用者進行 URL**取消** 按鈕。

trans-unit.source: The CancelDestinationPageUrl property specifies the step that is displayed when the user clicks the **Cancel** button on the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard> control.
trans-unit.target: CancelDestinationPageUrl 屬性指定當使用者按一下顯示的步驟**取消**按鈕<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard>控制項。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.DisplayCancelButton%2A> property is set to `true` and the CancelDestinationPageUrl property is not set, the Web page is refreshed and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.OnCancelButtonClick%2A> event is raised.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.DisplayCancelButton%2A>屬性設定為`true`CancelDestinationPageUrl 屬性未設定，重新整理網頁時，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.OnCancelButtonClick%2A>就會引發事件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.OnCancelButtonClick%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.DisplayCancelButton%2A>

trans-unit.target: 使用者重新導向至當使用者按一下 URL**取消**上<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default is an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: 預設為空字串 ("")。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the amount of space between the contents of the cell and the cell border.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定儲存格的內容和資料格框線之間的空間數量。

trans-unit.source: Use the CellPadding property to control the spacing between the contents of a cell and the cell border.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用 CellPadding 屬性來控制的儲存格的內容與儲存格框線之間的間距。

trans-unit.source: The padding amount that is specified is added to all four sides of the cell.
trans-unit.target: 指定的填補量會加入至儲存格的四個邊。

trans-unit.source: All cells in a column share the same cell width; therefore, the spacing is applied to the widest cell in the column.
trans-unit.target: 資料行中的所有資料格會共用同一個儲存格的寬度。因此，間距會套用到資料行中最寬的資料格。

trans-unit.source: Similarly, all cells in the same row share the same cell height.
trans-unit.target: 同樣地，相同的資料列中的所有資料格會共用相同的儲存格高度。

trans-unit.source: Thus, the spacing is applied to the tallest cell in the row.
trans-unit.target: 因此，間距會套用到資料列中最高的儲存格。

trans-unit.source: Individual cell sizes cannot be specified.
trans-unit.target: 個別儲存格大小不能指定。

trans-unit.source: The amount of space, in pixels, between the contents of a cell and the cell border.
trans-unit.target: 以像素的儲存格的內容與資料格框線之間的空間數量。

trans-unit.source: The default is 0.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 0。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the amount of space between cells.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定儲存格之間的空間量。

trans-unit.source: Use the CellSpacing property to control the spacing between adjacent cells in a Wizard control.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用 CellSpacing 屬性來控制精靈控制項中的相鄰資料格之間的間距。

trans-unit.source: This spacing is applied both vertically and horizontally.
trans-unit.target: 垂直和水平，則會套用這個間距。

trans-unit.source: The amount of space, in pixels, between cells.
trans-unit.target: 以像素的儲存格之間的空間數量。

trans-unit.source: The default is 0.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 0。

trans-unit.source: There can be a difference in the rendering of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard> control depending on whether this property is set to `true` or `false`.
trans-unit.target: 可以有不同的轉譯的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard>根據此屬性是否設定為控制項`true`或`false`。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard>

trans-unit.source: When this property value is set to `true` and the sidebar is displayed, cell spacing is not applied to the `HeadCell`, `StepCell`, or `NavigationCell` elements of the control's table.

trans-unit.source: When this value is `false`, cell spacing is applied.
trans-unit.target: 當這個值是`false`，儲存格的空格會套用。

trans-unit.source: This may affect how the control is rendered.

trans-unit.source: Use the FinishButtonClick event to provide additional processing when the **Finish** button is clicked.
trans-unit.target: 提供額外的處理時使用 FinishButtonClick 事件**完成**按鈕。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB︰ 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.target: 當<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.FinishCompleteButtonType%2A>屬性設定為<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonType>欄位中，使用 FinishCompleteButtonImageUrl 屬性來指定要顯示之影像**完成** 按鈕。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonType> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.FinishCompleteButtonType%2A>

trans-unit.source: Gets a reference to a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style"></xref> object that defines the settings for the **Finish** button.
trans-unit.target: 取得參考<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style"></xref>物件定義的設定，**完成** 按鈕。

trans-unit.source: The FinishCompleteButtonStyle property defines the appearance for the **Finish** button on the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard> control.
trans-unit.target: FinishCompleteButtonStyle 屬性定義的外觀**完成**按鈕<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard>控制項。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard>

trans-unit.source: The FinishCompleteButtonStyle property is read-only; however, you can set the properties of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style> object that it returns.
trans-unit.target: FinishCompleteButtonStyle 屬性是唯讀的。不過，您可以設定的屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style>它所傳回的物件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style>

trans-unit.source: You can set these properties declaratively in the form `Property-Subproperty`, where `Subproperty` represents a property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style> class (for example, `CancelButtonStyle-ForeColor`).
trans-unit.target: 您可以在表單中，以宣告方式設定這些屬性`Property-Subproperty`，其中`Subproperty`代表的屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style>類別 (例如， `CancelButtonStyle-ForeColor`)。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style>

trans-unit.source: You can set a property programmatically in the form `Property.Subproperty` (for example, `CancelButtonStyle.ForeColor`).
trans-unit.target: 您可以在表單中，以程式設計方式設定屬性`Property.Subproperty`(例如， `CancelButtonStyle.ForeColor`)。

trans-unit.source: Common settings include custom background color, text color, and font properties.
trans-unit.target: 一般設定包括自訂背景色彩、 文字色彩和字型屬性。

trans-unit.source: The style settings for the FinishCompleteButtonStyle property are merged with the style settings for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.NavigationButtonStyle%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: FinishCompleteButtonStyle 屬性的樣式設定會與樣式設定合併<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.NavigationButtonStyle%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.NavigationButtonStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: Any setting that is applied in the FinishCompleteButtonStyle property overrides the corresponding setting in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.NavigationButtonStyle%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 套用 FinishCompleteButtonStyle 屬性中的設定會覆寫中的對應設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.NavigationButtonStyle%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.NavigationButtonStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: A reference to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style"></xref> that defines the style settings for **Finish** on the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 若要參考<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style"></xref>所定義的樣式設定**完成**上<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the text caption that is displayed for the **Finish** button.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定所顯示的文字標題**完成** 按鈕。

trans-unit.source: The FinishCompleteButtonText property contains the text that is displayed for the **Finish** button on the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard> control.
trans-unit.target: FinishCompleteButtonText 屬性包含文字的顯示**完成**按鈕<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard>控制項。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard>

trans-unit.source: Depending on the value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.FinishCompleteButtonType%2A> property, the FinishCompleteButtonText property can appear as text on a button, as text displayed as an alternative to an image in browsers that do not render images, or as the text of a link.
trans-unit.target: 值而定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.FinishCompleteButtonType%2A>屬性，FinishCompleteButtonText 屬性可以顯示為文字的按鈕，以文字顯示為無法呈現影像的瀏覽器中的映像的替代方案或連結的文字。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.FinishCompleteButtonType%2A>

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the field values for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.FinishCompleteButtonType%2A> property and the respective effect of each on the **Finish** button text.
trans-unit.target: 下表列出的欄位值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.FinishCompleteButtonType%2A>屬性，在每個個別的效果**完成**按鈕文字。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.FinishCompleteButtonType%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonType> Text appears as alternative text for the image.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonType>文字會顯示為影像的替代文字。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonType>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonType> Text appears as link text.

trans-unit.source: The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性的值設定時，可以自動儲存到資源檔使用設計工具。

trans-unit.source: The default text for the control is localized based on the current locale for the server.
trans-unit.target: 控制項的預設文字會根據伺服器的目前地區設定來當地語系化。

trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonType"> </xref>。

trans-unit.target: FinishDestinationPageUrl 屬性指定當使用者按一下顯示的步驟**完成**按鈕<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard>控制項。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the template that is used to display the navigation area on the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepType"></xref> step.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定用來顯示功能區域的範本<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepType"></xref>步驟。

trans-unit.source: Use the FinishNavigationTemplate property to specify the custom content that is displayed for the navigation area on the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepType> step of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard> control.
trans-unit.target: 若要指定功能區顯示的自訂內容使用 FinishNavigationTemplate 屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepType>步驟<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard>控制項。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepType>

trans-unit.source: Define the content by creating a template that specifies how the navigation area is rendered on the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepType> step.
trans-unit.target: 您可以建立範本會指定功能區上的呈現方式定義內容<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepType>步驟。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepType>

trans-unit.source: The custom content for the template is contained within the FinishNavigationTemplate object.
trans-unit.target: FinishNavigationTemplate 物件內包含範本的自訂內容。

trans-unit.source: You can add custom content to the FinishNavigationTemplate object either by using template-editing mode in design view or by defining the FinishNavigationTemplate object inline using `FinishNavigationTemplate` tags.
trans-unit.target: 您可以將自訂內容加入 FinishNavigationTemplate 物件在設計檢視中使用範本編輯模式或藉由定義 FinishNavigationTemplate 物件內嵌`FinishNavigationTemplate`標記。

trans-unit.source: The content can be as simple as plain text or more complex (embedding other controls in the template, for example).
trans-unit.target: 內容可以是以純文字格式一樣簡單或複雜 （將其他控制項內嵌在範本中，例如）。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The FinishNavigationTemplate object that is contained in the FinishNavigationTemplate property must contain two <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.IButtonControl> controls, one with its <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.IButtonControl.CommandName%2A> property set to "MoveComplete" and the other with its <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.IButtonControl.CommandName%2A> property set to "MovePrevious", to enable the navigation feature.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > FinishNavigationTemplate 屬性中所包含的 FinishNavigationTemplate 物件必須包含兩個<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.IButtonControl>控制項具有其<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.IButtonControl.CommandName%2A>屬性設定為"MoveComplete"，而另一個具有其<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.IButtonControl.CommandName%2A>屬性設為"MovePrevious 」，以啟用巡覽功能。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.IButtonControl.CommandName%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.IButtonControl.CommandName%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.IButtonControl>

trans-unit.source: To access a control that is defined in a template programmatically, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CompositeControl.Controls%2A> collection of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard> object.
trans-unit.target: 若要存取以程式設計方式在範本中定義的控制項，請使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CompositeControl.Controls%2A>集合<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard>物件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CompositeControl.Controls%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can also use the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.FindControl%2A> method of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard> object to find the control, if the control has an <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID%2A> property specified.
trans-unit.target: 您也可以使用<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.FindControl%2A>方法<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard>要尋找控制項，控制項必須有物件<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID%2A>指定屬性。</xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard> </xref:System.Web.UI.Control.FindControl%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.ITemplate"></xref> that defines the content for the navigation area for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepType"></xref> on the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Web.UI.ITemplate"> </xref>定義之瀏覽區域內容<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepType"></xref>上<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the template that is used to display the header area on the control.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定用來在控制項上顯示的標頭區域的範本。

trans-unit.source: Use the HeaderTemplate property to specify the custom content that is displayed for the header area on a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard> control.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的標頭區域會顯示的自訂內容 HeaderTemplate 屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard>控制項。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard>

trans-unit.source: Define the content by creating a template that specifies how the header area is rendered.
trans-unit.target: 建立指定的標頭區域的呈現方式的範本定義的內容。

trans-unit.source: The custom content for the template is contained within the HeaderTemplate object.
trans-unit.target: HeaderTemplate 物件內包含範本的自訂內容。

trans-unit.source: You can add custom content to the HeaderTemplate object either by using template-editing mode in design view or by defining the HeaderTemplate object inline using `HeaderTemplate` tags.
trans-unit.target: 您可以將自訂內容加入 HeaderTemplate 物件在設計檢視中使用範本編輯模式或藉由定義 HeaderTemplate 物件內嵌`HeaderTemplate`標記。

trans-unit.source: The content can be as simple as plain text or more complex (embedding other controls in the template, for example).
trans-unit.target: 內容可以是以純文字格式一樣簡單或複雜 （將其他控制項內嵌在範本中，例如）。

trans-unit.source: To access a control that is defined in a template programmatically, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CompositeControl.Controls%2A> collection of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard> object.
trans-unit.target: 若要存取以程式設計方式在範本中定義的控制項，請使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CompositeControl.Controls%2A>集合<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard>物件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CompositeControl.Controls%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can also use the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.FindControl%2A> method of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard> object to find the control, if the control has an <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID%2A> property specified.
trans-unit.target: 您也可以使用<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.FindControl%2A>方法<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard>要尋找控制項，控制項必須有物件<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID%2A>指定屬性。</xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard> </xref:System.Web.UI.Control.FindControl%2A>

trans-unit.source: The HeaderText property defines the text caption that is displayed for the header area on the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard> control.

trans-unit.source: To control the style of the header area, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.HeaderStyle%2A> property.

trans-unit.source: Alternatively, you can define your own custom UI for the header row by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.HeaderTemplate%2A> property instead of the HeaderText property.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > If both the HeaderText and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.HeaderTemplate%2A> properties are defined, the HeaderText property has no effect.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 如果這兩個 HeaderText 和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.HeaderTemplate%2A>屬性定義、 HeaderText 屬性沒有任何作用。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.HeaderTemplate%2A>

trans-unit.source: Gets a reference to a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style"></xref> object that defines the settings for the buttons in the navigation area on the control.

trans-unit.source: The NavigationButtonStyle property defines the appearance for the buttons in the navigation area on the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard> control.
trans-unit.target: NavigationButtonStyle 屬性上定義導覽區域中的按鈕的外觀<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard>控制項。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard>

trans-unit.source: The NavigationButtonStyle property is read-only; however, you can set the properties of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style> object that it returns.
trans-unit.target: NavigationButtonStyle 屬性是唯讀的。不過，您可以設定的屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style>它所傳回的物件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style>

trans-unit.source: You can set these properties declaratively in the form `Property-Subproperty`, where `Subproperty` represents a property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style> class (for example, `CancelButtonStyle-ForeColor`).
trans-unit.target: 您可以在表單中，以宣告方式設定這些屬性`Property-Subproperty`，其中`Subproperty`代表的屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style>類別 (例如， `CancelButtonStyle-ForeColor`)。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style>

trans-unit.source: You can set a property programmatically in the form `Property.Subproperty` (for example, `CancelButtonStyle.ForeColor`).
trans-unit.target: 您可以在表單中，以程式設計方式設定屬性`Property.Subproperty`(例如， `CancelButtonStyle.ForeColor`)。

trans-unit.source: Common settings include custom background color, text color, and font properties.
trans-unit.target: 一般設定包括自訂背景色彩、 文字色彩和字型屬性。

trans-unit.source: The style settings for the NavigationButtonStyle property are merged with the individual button styles.
trans-unit.target: 個別按鈕樣式合併 NavigationButtonStyle 屬性的樣式設定。

trans-unit.source: Any setting that is applied in the individual button style properties overrides the corresponding setting in the NavigationButtonStyle property.
trans-unit.target: 在個別的按鈕樣式屬性會套用任何設定會覆寫對應 NavigationButtonStyle 屬性中的設定。

trans-unit.source: For example, if you set the `FinishPreviousButtonStyle.ForeColor` property to `"red"` and the `NavigationButtonStyle.ForeColor` property to `"green"`, the color for the button will be red because the individual style settings of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.FinishPreviousButtonStyle%2A> property override the settings of the NavigationButtonStyle property.
trans-unit.target: 比方說，如果您設定`FinishPreviousButtonStyle.ForeColor`屬性`"red"`和`NavigationButtonStyle.ForeColor`屬性`"green"`的色彩按鈕會變成紅色，因為個別樣式設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.FinishPreviousButtonStyle%2A>屬性覆寫 NavigationButtonStyle 屬性的設定。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.FinishPreviousButtonStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: The following NavigationButtonStyle property styles are overridden by individual button style settings: - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.BackColor%2A> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.BorderColor%2A> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.BorderStyle%2A> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.BorderWidth%2A> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.Font%2A> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.ForeColor%2A> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.Height%2A> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.Width%2A>
trans-unit.target: 個別按鈕樣式設定會覆寫下列 NavigationButtonStyle 屬性樣式:- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.BackColor%2A>- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.BorderColor%2A>- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.BorderStyle%2A>- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.BorderWidth%2A>- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.Font%2A>- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.ForeColor%2A>- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.Height%2A>- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.Width%2A></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.Width%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.Height%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.ForeColor%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.Font%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.BorderWidth%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.BorderStyle%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.BorderColor%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.BackColor%2A>

trans-unit.target: 若要參考<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style"></xref>上定義導覽區域中的按鈕樣式設定<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard"> </xref>。

trans-unit.target: OnActiveStepChanged 方法就會引發<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.ActiveStepChanged>事件時<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.ActiveStep%2A>屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard>控制項變更。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.ActiveStep%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.ActiveStepChanged>

trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.ActiveStepChanged>事件來提供額外的處理，當目前的步驟，會顯示在<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard>控制的變更。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.ActiveStepChanged>

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: 引發事件會透過委派事件處理常式叫用。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [NIB: Raising an Event](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/f2adaf01-1ed1-42e1-8c31-8d467e7e0ee2).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB︰ 引發事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/f2adaf01-1ed1-42e1-8c31-8d467e7e0ee2)。

trans-unit.source: The OnActiveStepChanged method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: OnActiveStepChanged 方法也允許衍生的類別處理事件，而不用附加委派。

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: 這是處理衍生類別中的事件的慣用的技巧。

trans-unit.source: This field is static and read-only.
trans-unit.target: 此欄位為靜態，且為唯讀。

trans-unit.source: The SideBarButtonID field is used primarily by control developers.
trans-unit.target: SideBarButtonID 欄位主要由控制項開發人員使用。

trans-unit.source: The value for the SideBarButtonID is `"SideBarButton"`.
trans-unit.target: 值為 SideBarButtonID `"SideBarButton"`。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Gets a reference to a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style"></xref> object that defines the settings for the buttons on the sidebar.
trans-unit.target: 取得參考<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style"></xref>定義按鈕的設定，在 [資訊看板] 的物件。

trans-unit.source: The SideBarButtonStyle property defines the appearance of the buttons on the sidebar of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard> control.
trans-unit.target: SideBarButtonStyle 屬性定義的 [資訊看板] 上的按鈕外觀<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard>控制項。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard>

trans-unit.source: The SideBarButtonStyle property is read-only; however, you can set the properties of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style> object that it returns.
trans-unit.target: SideBarButtonStyle 屬性是唯讀的。不過，您可以設定的屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style>它所傳回的物件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style>

trans-unit.source: You can set these properties declaratively in the form `Property-Subproperty`, where `Subproperty` represents a property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style> class (for example, `CancelButtonStyle-ForeColor`).
trans-unit.target: 您可以在表單中，以宣告方式設定這些屬性`Property-Subproperty`，其中`Subproperty`代表的屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style>類別 (例如， `CancelButtonStyle-ForeColor`)。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style>

trans-unit.source: You can set a property programmatically in the form `Property.Subproperty` (for example, `CancelButtonStyle.ForeColor`).
trans-unit.target: 您可以在表單中，以程式設計方式設定屬性`Property.Subproperty`(例如， `CancelButtonStyle.ForeColor`)。

trans-unit.source: Common settings include custom background color, text color, and font properties.
trans-unit.target: 一般設定包括自訂背景色彩、 文字色彩和字型屬性。

trans-unit.source: The style settings for the SideBarButtonStyle property are merged with the style settings for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard> control.
trans-unit.target: SideBarButtonStyle 屬性的樣式設定會與樣式設定合併<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard>控制項。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard>

trans-unit.source: Any settings that are applied in the SideBarButtonStyle property override the corresponding settings in the properties of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard> control.
trans-unit.target: SideBarButtonStyle 屬性中所套用的任何設定覆寫的屬性中的對應設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard>控制項。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard>

trans-unit.source: The following <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard> style properties are overridden by SideBarButtonStyle settings: - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.BackColor%2A> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.BorderColor%2A> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.BorderStyle%2A> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.BorderWidth%2A> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.Font%2A> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.ForeColor%2A> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.Height%2A> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.Width%2A> However, when you use templates to define the appearance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard> control sidebar, the SideBarButtonStyle property has no effect.
trans-unit.target: 下列<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard>SideBarButtonStyle 設定樣式屬性會覆寫:- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.BackColor%2A>- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.BorderColor%2A>- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.BorderStyle%2A>- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.BorderWidth%2A>- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.Font%2A>- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.ForeColor%2A>- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.Height%2A>-<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.Width%2A>不過，當您使用範本來定義外觀<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard>控制 [資訊看板]，SideBarButtonStyle 屬性沒有任何作用。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.Width%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.Height%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.ForeColor%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.Font%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.BorderWidth%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.BorderStyle%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.BorderColor%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.BackColor%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard>

trans-unit.source: A reference to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style"></xref> that defines the style settings for the buttons on the sidebar of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard"></xref>.
