trans-unit.target: SideBarStyle 屬性中所套用的任何設定覆寫的屬性中的對應設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard>控制項。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The height property for SideBarStyle is ignored if the height is set to less than the height of the wizard.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > SideBarStyle 的 height 屬性會被忽略，如果將高度設為低於精靈的高度。

trans-unit.source: Values set for <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.NavigationStyle%2A> height and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.HeaderStyle%2A> height add to the total height of the wizard.
trans-unit.target: 為設定值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.NavigationStyle%2A>高度和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.HeaderStyle%2A>高度將加入至精靈的總高度。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.HeaderStyle%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.NavigationStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: For example, if the Wizard height is set to 500px and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.NavigationStyle%2A> height or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.HeaderStyle%2A> height is set to 50px or 10%, then the total wizard height is 550px.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果精靈高度設為 500px 和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.NavigationStyle%2A>高度或<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.HeaderStyle%2A>高度設為 50px 或 10%，則總精靈高度是 550px。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.HeaderStyle%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.NavigationStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: The following <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard> style properties are overridden by SideBarStyle settings: - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.BackColor%2A> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.BorderColor%2A> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.BorderStyle%2A> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.BorderWidth%2A> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.Font%2A> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.ForeColor%2A> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.Height%2A> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.Width%2A>
trans-unit.target: 下列<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard>SideBarStyle 設定樣式屬性會覆寫:- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.BackColor%2A>- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.BorderColor%2A>- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.BorderStyle%2A>- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.BorderWidth%2A>- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.Font%2A>- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.ForeColor%2A>- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.Height%2A>- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.Width%2A></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.Width%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.Height%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.ForeColor%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.Font%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.BorderWidth%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.BorderStyle%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.BorderColor%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.BackColor%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard>

trans-unit.source: A reference to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style"></xref> that defines the style settings for the sidebar area on the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 若要參考<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style"> </xref> ，定義樣式設定為 [資訊看板] 區域上<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the template that is used to display the sidebar area on the control.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定用來顯示在控制項上的 [資訊看板] 區域的範本。

trans-unit.source: Use the SideBarTemplate property to specify the custom content that is displayed for the sidebar area on a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard> control.
trans-unit.target: 使用 SideBarTemplate 屬性來指定會顯示 [資訊看板] 區域的自訂內容<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard>控制項。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard>

trans-unit.source: Define the content by creating a template that specifies how the sidebar area is rendered.
trans-unit.target: 建立指定的 [資訊看板] 區域的呈現方式的範本定義的內容。

trans-unit.source: The custom content for the template is contained within the SideBarTemplate object.
trans-unit.target: SideBarTemplate 物件內包含範本的自訂內容。

trans-unit.source: You can add custom content to the SideBarTemplate object either by using template-editing mode in design view or by defining the SideBarTemplate object inline using `SideBarTemplate` tags.
trans-unit.target: 您可以將自訂內容加入 SideBarTemplate 物件在設計檢視中使用範本編輯模式或藉由定義 SideBarTemplate 物件內嵌`SideBarTemplate`標記。

trans-unit.source: The content can be as simple as plain text or more complex (embedding other controls in the template, for example).
trans-unit.target: 內容可以是以純文字格式一樣簡單或複雜 （將其他控制項內嵌在範本中，例如）。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The SideBarTemplate object must contain a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> control or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView> control whose <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID%2A> property is set to `"SideBarList"` to enable the sidebar navigation feature.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > SideBarTemplate 物件必須包含<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>控制項或<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView>控制項<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID%2A>屬性設定為`"SideBarList"`啟用提要欄位巡覽功能。</xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>

trans-unit.source: Also, the `"SideBarList"` on the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView> control must contain an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.IButtonControl> control.
trans-unit.target: 此外，`"SideBarList"`上<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>或<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView>控制項必須包含<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.IButtonControl>控制項。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.IButtonControl> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>

trans-unit.source: To access a control that is defined in a template programmatically, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CompositeControl.Controls%2A> collection of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard> object.
trans-unit.target: 若要存取以程式設計方式在範本中定義的控制項，請使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CompositeControl.Controls%2A>集合<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard>物件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CompositeControl.Controls%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can also use the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.FindControl%2A> method of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard> object to find the control, if the control has an <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID%2A> property specified.
trans-unit.target: 您也可以使用<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.FindControl%2A>方法<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard>要尋找控制項，控制項必須有物件<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID%2A>指定屬性。</xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard> </xref:System.Web.UI.Control.FindControl%2A>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Web.UI.ITemplate"></xref> that contains the template for displaying the sidebar area on the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Web.UI.ITemplate"> </xref> ，其中包含的範本上顯示 [資訊看板] 區域<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that is used to render alternate text that notifies screen readers to skip the content in the sidebar area.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，這個值用來轉譯螢幕助讀員略過 [資訊看板] 區域中的內容會通知的替代文字。

trans-unit.source: Use the SkipLinkText property to specify the alternate text for a hidden image that is read by screen readers to provide the ability to skip the content for a sidebar area.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用 SkipLinkText 屬性來指定讀取螢幕助讀程式，讓您略過 [資訊看板] 區域的內容可以隱藏影像的替代文字。

trans-unit.source: The text that you specify provides assistive technology devices with a description of the hidden image that can be used to make the control more accessible.
trans-unit.target: 您指定的文字會提供具有描述可用來將控制項設為更容易存取的隱藏影像的輔助技術裝置。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > If the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.DisplaySideBar%2A> property is set to `false`, the SkipLinkText property does not create a hidden image with alternate text.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 如果<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.DisplaySideBar%2A>屬性設定為`false`，SkipLinkText 屬性不會建立隱藏的影像的替代文字。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.DisplaySideBar%2A>

trans-unit.source: The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性的值設定時，可以自動儲存到資源檔使用設計工具。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute> and [Globalization and Localization](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute>和[全球化和當地語系化](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。</xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute>

trans-unit.source: A string that the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard"></xref> renders as alternate text with an invisible image, as a hint to screen readers.
trans-unit.target: 字串<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard"></xref>為螢幕助讀程式提示將呈現為具有不可見的影像的替代文字。

trans-unit.source: The default is `"Skip Navigation Links"`.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是`"Skip Navigation Links"`。

trans-unit.source: The default text for the control is localized based on the current locale for the server.
trans-unit.target: 控制項的預設文字會根據伺服器的目前地區設定來當地語系化。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the template that is used to display the navigation area on the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepType"></xref> step of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定用來顯示功能區域的範本<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepType"></xref>步驟<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard"></xref>控制項。

trans-unit.source: Use the StartNavigationTemplate property to specify the custom content that is displayed for the navigation area on the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepType> step of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard> control.
trans-unit.target: 若要指定功能區顯示的自訂內容使用 StartNavigationTemplate 屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepType>步驟<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard>控制項。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepType>

trans-unit.source: Define the content by creating a template that specifies how the navigation area is rendered on the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepType> step.
trans-unit.target: 您可以建立範本會指定功能區上的呈現方式定義內容<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepType>步驟。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepType>

trans-unit.source: The custom content for the template is contained within the StartNavigationTemplate object.
trans-unit.target: StartNavigationTemplate 物件內包含範本的自訂內容。

trans-unit.source: You can add custom content to the StartNavigationTemplate object either by using template-editing mode in design view or by defining the StartNavigationTemplate object inline using `StartNavigationTemplate` tags.
trans-unit.target: 您可以將自訂內容加入 StartNavigationTemplate 物件在設計檢視中使用範本編輯模式或藉由定義 StartNavigationTemplate 物件內嵌`StartNavigationTemplate`標記。

trans-unit.source: The content can be as simple as plain text or more complex (embedding other controls in the template, for example).
trans-unit.target: 內容可以是以純文字格式一樣簡單或複雜 （將其他控制項內嵌在範本中，例如）。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The StartNavigationTemplate object that is contained in the StartNavigationTemplate property must contain an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.IButtonControl> control with the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.IButtonControl.CommandName%2A> property set to `"MoveNext"` to enable the navigation feature.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > StartNavigationTemplate 屬性中所包含的 StartNavigationTemplate 物件必須包含<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.IButtonControl>控制項<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.IButtonControl.CommandName%2A>屬性設定為`"MoveNext"`啟用瀏覽功能。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.IButtonControl.CommandName%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.IButtonControl>

trans-unit.source: To access a control that is defined in a template programmatically, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CompositeControl.Controls%2A> collection of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard> object.
trans-unit.target: 若要存取以程式設計方式在範本中定義的控制項，請使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CompositeControl.Controls%2A>集合<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard>物件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CompositeControl.Controls%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can also use the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.FindControl%2A> method of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard> object to find the control, if the control has an <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID%2A> property specified.
trans-unit.target: 您也可以使用<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.FindControl%2A>方法<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard>要尋找控制項，控制項必須有物件<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID%2A>指定屬性。</xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard> </xref:System.Web.UI.Control.FindControl%2A>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Web.UI.ITemplate"></xref> that contains the template for displaying the navigation area on the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepType"></xref> for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Web.UI.ITemplate"> </xref> ，其中包含的範本上顯示的導覽區域<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepType"></xref>如<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the identifier that is associated with the **Next** button on the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepType"></xref> step.
trans-unit.target: 擷取相關聯的識別項**下一步**按鈕<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepType"></xref>步驟。

trans-unit.source: This field is static and read-only.
trans-unit.target: 此欄位為靜態，且為唯讀。

trans-unit.source: The StartNextButtonID is used primarily by control developers.
trans-unit.target: StartNextButtonID 主要由控制項開發人員使用。

trans-unit.source: The value for the StartNextButtonID is `"StartNextButton"`.
trans-unit.target: 值為 StartNextButtonID `"StartNextButton"`。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the URL of the image that is displayed for the **Next** button on the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepType"></xref> step.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定顯示的影像 URL**下一步**按鈕<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepType"></xref>步驟。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.StartNextButtonType%2A> property is set to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonType> field, use the StartNextButtonImageUrl property to specify the image to display for the **Next** button.
trans-unit.target: 當<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.StartNextButtonType%2A>屬性設定為<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonType>欄位中，使用 StartNextButtonImageUrl 屬性來指定要顯示之影像**下一步** 按鈕。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonType> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.StartNextButtonType%2A>

trans-unit.source: The URL of the image displayed for **Next** on the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepType"></xref> of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 顯示影像的 URL**下一個**上<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepType"></xref>的<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default is an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: 預設為空字串 ("")。

trans-unit.source: Gets a reference to a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style"></xref> object that defines the settings for the **Next** button on the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepType"></xref> step.
trans-unit.target: 取得參考<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style"></xref>物件定義的設定，**下一步**按鈕<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepType"></xref>步驟。

trans-unit.source: The StartNextButtonStyle property defines the appearance for the **Next** button on the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepType> step of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard> control.
trans-unit.target: StartNextButtonStyle 屬性定義的外觀**下一步**按鈕<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepType>步驟<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard>控制項。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepType>

trans-unit.source: The StartNextButtonStyle property is read-only; however, you can set the properties of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style> object that it returns.
trans-unit.target: StartNextButtonStyle 屬性是唯讀的。不過，您可以設定的屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style>它所傳回的物件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style>

trans-unit.source: You can set these properties declaratively in the form `Property-Subproperty`, where `Subproperty` represents a property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style> class (for example, `CancelButtonStyle-ForeColor`).
trans-unit.target: 您可以在表單中，以宣告方式設定這些屬性`Property-Subproperty`，其中`Subproperty`代表的屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style>類別 (例如， `CancelButtonStyle-ForeColor`)。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style>

trans-unit.source: You can set a property programmatically in the form `Property.Subproperty` (for example, `CancelButtonStyle.ForeColor`).
trans-unit.target: 您可以在表單中，以程式設計方式設定屬性`Property.Subproperty`(例如， `CancelButtonStyle.ForeColor`)。

trans-unit.source: Common settings include custom background color, text color, and font properties.
trans-unit.target: 一般設定包括自訂背景色彩、 文字色彩和字型屬性。

trans-unit.source: The style settings for the StartNextButtonStyle property are merged with the style settings for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.NavigationButtonStyle%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: StartNextButtonStyle 屬性的樣式設定會與樣式設定合併<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.NavigationButtonStyle%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.NavigationButtonStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: Any setting that is applied in the StartNextButtonStyle property overrides the corresponding setting in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.NavigationButtonStyle%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 套用 StartNextButtonStyle 屬性中的設定會覆寫中的對應設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.NavigationButtonStyle%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.NavigationButtonStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: A reference to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style"></xref> that defines the style settings for **Next** on the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepType"></xref> of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 參考<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style"></xref>所定義的樣式設定**下一步**上<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepType"></xref>的<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the text caption that is displayed for the **Next** button on the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepType"></xref> step.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定所顯示的文字標題**下一步**按鈕<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepType"></xref>步驟。

trans-unit.source: The StartNextButtonText property contains the text that is displayed for the **Next** button on the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepType> step of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard> control.
trans-unit.target: StartNextButtonText 屬性包含文字的顯示**下一步**按鈕<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepType>步驟<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard>控制項。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepType>

trans-unit.source: Depending on the value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.StartNextButtonType%2A> property, the StartNextButtonText property can appear as text on a button, as text displayed as an alternative to an image in browsers that do not render images, or as the text of a link.
trans-unit.target: 值而定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.StartNextButtonType%2A>屬性，StartNextButtonText 屬性可以顯示為文字的按鈕，以文字顯示為無法呈現影像的瀏覽器中的映像的替代方案或連結的文字。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.StartNextButtonType%2A>

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the field values for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.StartNextButtonType%2A> property and the respective effect of each on the **Next** button text.
trans-unit.target: 下表列出的欄位值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.StartNextButtonType%2A>屬性，在每個個別的效果**下一個**按鈕文字。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.StartNextButtonType%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonType> Text appears on the button.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonType>文字會出現在按鈕上。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonType>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonType> Text appears as alternative text for the image.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonType>文字會顯示為影像的替代文字。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonType>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonType> Text appears as a link.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonType>文字會顯示為連結。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonType>

trans-unit.source: The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性的值設定時，可以自動儲存到資源檔使用設計工具。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute> and [Globalization and Localization](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute>和[全球化和當地語系化](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。</xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute>

trans-unit.source: The text caption displayed for **Next** on the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepType"></xref> of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 顯示的文字標題**下一個**上<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepType"></xref>的<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default is `"Next"`.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是`"Next"`。

trans-unit.source: The default text for the control is localized based on the current locale for the server.
trans-unit.target: 控制項的預設文字會根據伺服器的目前地區設定來當地語系化。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the type of button that is rendered as the **Next** button on the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepType"></xref> step.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定轉譯為按鈕的型別**下一步**按鈕<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepType"></xref>步驟。

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonType"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonType"></xref>值。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonType"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonType"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the template that is used to display the navigation area on any <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase"></xref>-derived objects other than the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepType"></xref>, the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepType"></xref>, or <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepType"></xref> step.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定用來導覽區域中顯示任何範本<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase"> </xref>-以外衍生物件<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepType"> </xref>、 <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepType"> </xref>，或<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepType"></xref>步驟。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.StartNavigationTemplate%2A> property to specify the custom content that is displayed for the navigation area on the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepType> step of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard> control.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.StartNavigationTemplate%2A>屬性來指定自訂此內容上會顯示瀏覽區域<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepType>步驟<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard>控制項。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepType> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.StartNavigationTemplate%2A>

trans-unit.source: Define the content by creating a template that specifies how the navigation area is rendered on the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepType> step.
trans-unit.target: 您可以建立範本會指定功能區上的呈現方式定義內容<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepType>步驟。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepType>

trans-unit.source: The custom content for the template is contained within the StepNavigationTemplate object.
trans-unit.target: StepNavigationTemplate 物件內包含範本的自訂內容。

trans-unit.source: You can add custom content to the StepNavigationTemplate object either by using template-editing mode in design view or by defining the StepNavigationTemplate object inline using `StepNavigationTemplate` tags.
trans-unit.target: 您可以將自訂內容加入 StepNavigationTemplate 物件在設計檢視中使用範本編輯模式或藉由定義 StepNavigationTemplate 物件內嵌`StepNavigationTemplate`標記。

trans-unit.source: The content can be as simple as plain text or more complex (embedding other controls in the template, for example).
trans-unit.target: 內容可以是以純文字格式一樣簡單或複雜 （將其他控制項內嵌在範本中，例如）。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The StepNavigationTemplate object that is contained in the StepNavigationTemplate property must contain two <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.IButtonControl> controls, one with its <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.IButtonControl.CommandName%2A> property set to `"MoveNext"` and one with its <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.IButtonControl.CommandName%2A> property set to `"MovePrevious"`, to enable the navigation feature.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > StepNavigationTemplate 屬性中所包含的 StepNavigationTemplate 物件必須包含兩個<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.IButtonControl>控制項，一個具有其<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.IButtonControl.CommandName%2A>屬性設定為`"MoveNext"`而另一個為其<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.IButtonControl.CommandName%2A>屬性設定為`"MovePrevious"`，若要啟用瀏覽功能。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.IButtonControl.CommandName%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.IButtonControl.CommandName%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.IButtonControl>

trans-unit.source: To access a control that is defined in a template programmatically, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CompositeControl.Controls%2A> collection of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard> object.
trans-unit.target: 若要存取以程式設計方式在範本中定義的控制項，請使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CompositeControl.Controls%2A>集合<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard>物件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CompositeControl.Controls%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can also use the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.FindControl%2A> method of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard> object to find the control, if the control has an <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID%2A> property specified.
trans-unit.target: 您也可以使用<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.FindControl%2A>方法<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard>要尋找控制項，控制項必須有物件<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID%2A>指定屬性。</xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard> </xref:System.Web.UI.Control.FindControl%2A>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Web.UI.ITemplate"></xref> that contains the template for displaying the navigation area on any <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase"></xref>-derived objects of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard"></xref> control other than the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepType"></xref>, <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepType"></xref>, or <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepType"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Web.UI.ITemplate"> </xref> ，其中包含的範本上任何顯示的導覽區域<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase"> </xref>-衍生的物件<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard"></xref>以外控制<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepType"> </xref>， <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepType"> </xref>，或<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepType"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.StepNextButtonType%2A> property is set to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonType> field, use the StepNextButtonImageUrl property to specify the image to display for the **Next** button.
trans-unit.target: 當<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.StepNextButtonType%2A>屬性設定為<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonType>欄位中，使用 StepNextButtonImageUrl 屬性來指定要顯示之影像**下一步** 按鈕。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonType> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.StepNextButtonType%2A>

trans-unit.source: Gets a reference to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style"></xref> object that defines the settings for the **Next** button.
trans-unit.target: 取得參考<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style"></xref>物件定義的設定，**下一步** 按鈕。

trans-unit.source: The StepNextButtonStyle property defines the appearance for the **Next** button on the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard> control.
trans-unit.target: StepNextButtonStyle 屬性定義的外觀**下一個**按鈕<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard>控制項。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard>

trans-unit.source: The StepNextButtonStyle property is read-only; however, you can set the properties of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style> object that it returns.
trans-unit.target: StepNextButtonStyle 屬性是唯讀的。不過，您可以設定的屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style>它所傳回的物件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style>

trans-unit.source: You can set these properties declaratively in the form `Property-Subproperty`, where `Subproperty` represents a property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style> class (for example, `CancelButtonStyle-ForeColor`).
trans-unit.target: 您可以在表單中，以宣告方式設定這些屬性`Property-Subproperty`，其中`Subproperty`代表的屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style>類別 (例如， `CancelButtonStyle-ForeColor`)。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style>

trans-unit.source: You can set a property programmatically in the form `Property.Subproperty` (for example, `CancelButtonStyle.ForeColor`).
trans-unit.target: 您可以在表單中，以程式設計方式設定屬性`Property.Subproperty`(例如， `CancelButtonStyle.ForeColor`)。

trans-unit.source: Common settings include custom background color, text color, and font properties.
trans-unit.target: 一般設定包括自訂背景色彩、 文字色彩和字型屬性。

trans-unit.source: The style settings for the StepNextButtonStyle property are merged with the style settings for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.NavigationButtonStyle%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: StepNextButtonStyle 屬性的樣式設定會與樣式設定合併<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.NavigationButtonStyle%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.NavigationButtonStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: Any setting that is applied in the StepNextButtonStyle property overrides the corresponding setting in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.NavigationButtonStyle%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 套用 StepNextButtonStyle 屬性中的設定會覆寫中的對應設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.NavigationButtonStyle%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.NavigationButtonStyle%2A>

trans-unit.target: 套用 StepPreviousButtonStyle 屬性中的設定會覆寫中的對應設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.NavigationButtonStyle%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.NavigationButtonStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: A reference to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style"></xref> that defines the style settings for **Previous** on a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepType"></xref> for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 參考<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style"></xref>所定義的樣式設定**上一步**上<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepType"></xref>如<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the text caption that is displayed for the **Previous** button.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定所顯示的文字標題**上一步** 按鈕。

trans-unit.source: The StepPreviousButtonText property contains the text that is displayed for the **Previous** button on the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard> control.
trans-unit.target: StepPreviousButtonText 屬性包含文字的顯示**上一步**按鈕<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard>控制項。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard>

trans-unit.source: Depending on the value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.StepPreviousButtonType%2A> property, the StepPreviousButtonText property can appear as text on a button, as text displayed as an alternative to an image in browsers that do not render images, or as the text of a link.
trans-unit.target: 值而定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.StepPreviousButtonType%2A>屬性，StepPreviousButtonText 屬性可以顯示為文字的按鈕，以文字顯示為無法呈現影像的瀏覽器中的映像的替代方案或連結的文字。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.StepPreviousButtonType%2A>

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the field values for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.StepPreviousButtonType%2A> property and the respective effect of each on the **Previous** button text.
trans-unit.target: 下表列出的欄位值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.StepPreviousButtonType%2A>屬性，在每個個別的效果**上一步**按鈕文字。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.StepPreviousButtonType%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonType> Text appears on the button.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonType>文字會出現在按鈕上。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonType>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonType> Text appears as alternative text for the image.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonType>文字會顯示為影像的替代文字。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonType>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonType> Text appears as a link.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonType>文字會顯示為連結。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonType>

trans-unit.source: The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性的值設定時，可以自動儲存到資源檔使用設計工具。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute> and [Globalization and Localization](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute>和[全球化和當地語系化](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。</xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute>

trans-unit.source: The text caption displayed for **Previous** on the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 顯示的文字標題**上一步**上<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default is `"Previous"`.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是`"Previous"`。

trans-unit.source: The default text for the control is localized based on the current locale for the server.
trans-unit.target: 控制項的預設文字會根據伺服器的目前地區設定來當地語系化。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the type of button that is rendered as the **Previous** button.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定轉譯為按鈕的型別**上一步** 按鈕。

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonType"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonType"></xref>值。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonType"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonType"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets a reference to a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style"></xref> object that defines the settings for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStep"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: 取得參考<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style"></xref>物件定義的設定， <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStep"> </xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: The StepStyle property gets a reference to a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style> object that defines the appearance for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStep> objects on the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard> control.
trans-unit.target: StepStyle 屬性取得的參考<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style>物件，定義的外觀<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStep>物件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard>控制項。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStep> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style>

trans-unit.source: The StepStyle property is read-only; however, you can set the properties of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style> object that it returns.
trans-unit.target: StepStyle 屬性是唯讀的。不過，您可以設定的屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style>它所傳回的物件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style>

trans-unit.source: You can set these properties declaratively in the form `Property-Subproperty`, where `Subproperty` represents a property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style> class (for example, `CancelButtonStyle-ForeColor`).
trans-unit.target: 您可以在表單中，以宣告方式設定這些屬性`Property-Subproperty`，其中`Subproperty`代表的屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style>類別 (例如， `CancelButtonStyle-ForeColor`)。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style>

trans-unit.source: You can set a property programmatically in the form `Property.Subproperty` (for example, `CancelButtonStyle.ForeColor`).
trans-unit.target: 您可以在表單中，以程式設計方式設定屬性`Property.Subproperty`(例如， `CancelButtonStyle.ForeColor`)。

trans-unit.source: Common settings include custom background color, text color, and font properties.
trans-unit.target: 一般設定包括自訂背景色彩、 文字色彩和字型屬性。

trans-unit.source: The style settings for the StepStyle property are merged with the style settings for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.Style%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard> control.
trans-unit.target: StepStyle 屬性的樣式設定會與樣式設定合併<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.Style%2A>屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard>控制項。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.Style%2A>

trans-unit.source: Any setting that is applied in the StepStyle property overrides the corresponding setting in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.Style%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard> control.
trans-unit.target: 套用 StepStyle 屬性中的設定會覆寫中的對應設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.Style%2A>屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard>控制項。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.Style%2A>

trans-unit.source: The following StepStyle properties can be set to override the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.Style%2A> properties of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard> control: - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.BackColor%2A> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.BorderColor%2A> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.BorderStyle%2A> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.BorderWidth%2A> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.CssClass%2A> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.Font%2A> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.ForeColor%2A> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.Height%2A> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.Width%2A> When you use a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplatedWizardStep> template to define the appearance for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStep> objects, the StepStyle property has no effect.
trans-unit.target: 下列 StepStyle 屬性可以設定覆寫<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.Style%2A>屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard>控制項:- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.BackColor%2A>- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.BorderColor%2A>- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.BorderStyle%2A>- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.BorderWidth%2A>- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.CssClass%2A>- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.Font%2A>- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.ForeColor%2A>- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.Height%2A>-<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.Width%2A>當您使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplatedWizardStep>範本來定義外觀<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStep>物件 StepStyle 屬性沒有任何作用。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStep> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplatedWizardStep> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.Width%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.Height%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.ForeColor%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.Font%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.CssClass%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.BorderWidth%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.BorderStyle%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.BorderColor%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.BackColor%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.Style%2A>

trans-unit.source: A reference to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style"></xref> that defines the style settings for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStep"></xref> objects on the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 參考<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style"></xref>所定義的樣式設定<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStep"></xref>物件<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard"> </xref>。

trans-unit.target: 追蹤檢視狀態。

trans-unit.target: 取得 ID <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStep"> </xref>中的預留位置<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard"></xref>控制項。

trans-unit.source: The placeholder ID must be set to "WizardStepPlaceHolder".
trans-unit.target: 預留位置識別碼必須設"WizardStepPlaceHolder"。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection containing all the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase"></xref> objects that are defined for the control.
trans-unit.target: 取得集合，其中包含所有<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase"></xref>控制項定義的物件。

trans-unit.source: The WizardSteps property returns a collection of <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase> objects that make up the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard> control.
trans-unit.target: WizardSteps 屬性傳回的集合<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase>構成物件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard>控制項。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase>

trans-unit.source: You can use the WizardSteps collection to access the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase> objects that are contained in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard> control programmatically.
trans-unit.target: 您可用來存取 WizardSteps 集合<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase>中所包含的物件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard>以程式設計方式控制。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase>

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepCollection.Add%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepCollection.Remove%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepCollection.Clear%2A>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepCollection.Insert%2A> methods to manipulate the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase> objects in the collection programmatically.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepCollection.Add%2A>， <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepCollection.Remove%2A>， <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepCollection.Clear%2A>，和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepCollection.Insert%2A>方法來管理<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase>物件在集合中以程式設計的方式。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepCollection.Insert%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepCollection.Clear%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepCollection.Remove%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepCollection.Add%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > If you are using Microsoft Visual Studio 2005, note that the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.ActiveStepIndex%2A> is persisted in Source view.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 如果您使用 Microsoft Visual Studio 2005，請注意，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.ActiveStepIndex%2A>保存在原始碼檢視。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.ActiveStepIndex%2A>

trans-unit.source: If you change the WizardSteps property in Design view by clicking the sidebar buttons, and you then run the page, the first step of the `Wizard` control might not be shown because the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.ActiveStepIndex%2A> might be pointing to a different step.
trans-unit.target: 如果您變更 WizardSteps 屬性在設計檢視中的依序按一下 [資訊看板] 按鈕時，您然後執行 [] 頁面的第一個步驟`Wizard`控制項可能不會顯示，因為<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.ActiveStepIndex%2A>可能指向不同的步驟。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.ActiveStepIndex%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard> control contains multiple <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepCollection> collections, the collections will be merged.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard>控制項包含多個<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepCollection>集合，集合將會合併。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepCollection> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard>

trans-unit.source: This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes.
trans-unit.target: 無法設定這個屬性的主題或樣式表主題。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepCollection"></xref> representing all the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase"></xref> objects defined for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepCollection"> </xref>代表所有<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase"></xref>物件定義<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard"> </xref>。
